mapper.select: SELECT sys_id, sys_nm, resve_reqst_ty, count(sys_id) as sys_cnt, count(resve_reqst_ty) as reqst_cnt, DECODE(resve_reqst_ty, 'EXPRN', '통합예약(체험)', 'PBLPRFR', '통합예약(공연/전시)', 'EDU', '통합예약(교육/강좌)') AS reqst_ty FROM ( SELECT a.mbr_tkn_value, a.device_se, b.sys_nm, c.push_sj, c.push_nm, c.link_info, c.push_trnsmis_sttus, c.sys_id, c.bbs_id, c.resve_reqst_ty, c.mber_id, c.resve_reqst_dt FROM TAD_MN_PUSH_USER a, TAD_MN_PUSH_GUBUN b, TAD_MN_PUSH_MANAGE c WHERE b.push_at = 'Y' AND c.push_trnsmis_sttus = 'Y' and a.mbr_tkn_value = b.mbr_tkn_value AND b.sys_id = c.sys_id AND (b.bbs_id = c.bbs_id OR b.bbs_id = '0' ) GROUP BY a.mbr_tkn_value, b.sys_id, c.resve_reqst_ty ) GROUP BY sys_id
